sourcesContent: import { Grid, Paper, Typography } from '@mui/material' import { Box } from '@mui/system' import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { UserContext } from '../../Context/Context' function products({ products }) { const navigate = useNavigate() const {setDeatils}=useContext(UserContext) const handleView=(item)=>{ setDeatils(item) navigate('/view') } return ( {products.map((item) => {item.name} {item.discription} watchlist add to cart )} ) } export default products
